entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.5°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Thursday 28 April 2016
